data.name: GirisBaslik
data.value: SPORTS, HEALTH, LIFE

data.name: GirisParagraf
data.value: SPORTS COURSES: All about sports

data.name: HangiSporlar
data.value: In which sports do you share courses?

data.name: HangiSporlarParagraf
data.value: You can view which sports branches we organize and share courses on our Sports page. In addition, we would like to point out that, as Extrem Sport team, we are conducting a study to expand the sports branches in which we make campaigns and share courses. We will be with you in many more sports soon. Stay on track.

data.name: Kampanya
data.value: Can only members benefit from your campaigns?

data.name: KampanyaParagraf
data.value: Yes, you must be a member and be logged in to benefit from our campaigns.

data.name: KampanyaSure
data.value: Are your campaigns indefinite?

data.name: KampanyaSureParagraf
data.value: Some of our campaigns are valid for an indefinite period and some are valid for a limited time. Time information is specified on our campaigns page. In order not to miss our campaigns, which are valid for a limited time, you should follow your subscription mails.

data.name: Katki1Aciklama
data.value: The main reason for this is that exercise strengthens the blood (and therefore oxygen) supply of the brain. This provides the energy required for thinking. It can also stimulate the growth of neurons and perhaps increase the release of certain neurotransmitters and growth hormones that are crucial to the overall health of the brain. All this contributes to better concentration, intelligence and memory.

data.name: Katki1Baslik
data.value: Exercising has a positive effect on brain health.

data.name: Katki2Aciklama
data.value: Exercising regulates appetite, prevents the formation of excess weight and increases the ratio of muscle by reducing the fat ratio in the body. It improves the body's ability to stand upright and increases stamina. Combined with regular nutrition, it contributes significantly to bone development.

data.name: Katki2Baslik
data.value: Improves your physical performance.

data.name: Katki3Aciklama
data.value: Regular sports activities play a big role in our cardiovascular system. Since the heart is in the muscular structure system, we should not give up sports activities in order to maximize the contraction level and thus to pump blood with a good distribution to our whole organism. On the other hand, physical activity will be a good weapon against cardiovascular disease risk factor; It keeps arterial hypertension at a minimum level and is a good remedy against atherosclerosis.

data.name: Katki3Baslik
data.value: Sport is essential for your health.

data.name: Katki4Aciklama
data.value: Many negative situations and life difficulties in daily life constitute the stress sources of individuals. As a result of the studies carried out, regular physical activity is one of the suggestions to reduce stress, increase human well-being and be healthy. The importance of regular activities and exercises for the protection of physical and mental health is increasing day by day.

data.name: Katki4Baslik
data.value: It helps you deal with stress.

data.name: Katkilari
data.value: Contribution of doing sports to our lives

data.name: NasilUlasiriz
data.value: How can we reach you?

data.name: NasilUlasirizParagraf
data.value: To reach us, you can send us an e-mail, call by phone or come to our office whose address is written. You can also reach us on our Twitter, Facebook and Instagram accounts.
